description: SINGAPORE - Nearly 30 years after her training stint in China, former national gymnast Eileen Chai still remembers the fear of making a wrong move and being punished. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 'Bad moments' in China training stint still plague ex-national gymnast Eileen Chai
title_page: 'Bad moments' in China training stint still plague ex-national gymnast Eileen Chai | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Nearly 30 years after her training stint in China, former national gymnast Eileen Chai still remembers the fear of making a wrong move and being punished.
So vividly, that the 42-year-old broke down in tears while recounting her experience to The Straits Times recently.
